column5: Giant baby seizes shark  Giant baby delights in fast-tracked sushi meal  O.K. it was my son.  Just found the pictures from the summer and had a laugh   **No shark was harmed in the creation of this post**   s.
LOL...great pics Snag.  Looking forward to your first father/son fishing report.  You do have equipment for him right???
if you had the dun dunt  dun dunt dun dunt  jaws music in the back ground it would be perfect....LOL
Here is a poor pic of us fishing together when he was brand new We caught some smallies in the shallows together. The only fish we caught that weekend actually, so he's got good luck!
Terry,  I hear that music when his face turns red and an unpleasant odour consumes the room.
You may want to consider getting that Shark a Tetanus shot....
You guys are watching too much Cronzy!
